availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Lewis P. Cook (Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Mary E. Carney Cook. Father of John R. Cook, Reddick Cook, Jelina H. Cook, and William M. Cook. Farmer in Graves County, Kentucky in 1850. Resident of Ballard County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
KYR-0001-019-0078.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves, District 2, p. 380A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard, Picketts, p. 594.
